name: Brawl Quest: Alice Brigade
description:
Evil bosses have run rampant across the Metro. You must find them and stop them! Go through vast areas of the Metro, complete quests, defeat challenging bosses, unlock unique brawlers, and collect cute pets. Join Alice and Luwan in this all-new beat em up as they fight across the Metro and restore peace and justice to the city.

Brawl Quest is an arcade action beat 'em up that features fast-paced action with simple controls!

Features:
* One-handed touch controls
* Playable Offline
* Collect cute pets
* Award-winning action beat 'em up
* 2D frame-by-frame graphics
* Collect unique characters that have their own moves and play styles
* Over 50+ handcrafted stages each with 2 different difficulties
* Intense boss battles

Awards
- "First Place" Winner Big Indie Pitch GSTAR 2018
- "Official Selection" 2019 Taipei Game Show Indie House
- "2nd Place" GTR Pre-acceleration Program BKK 2019
- "Top 20" GTR Acceleration Program Busan 2019
- "Finalist" SEA Game Awards Level Up KL 2019
- "Best Game Art Nominee" GameOn Awards PH 2019
- "Best Mobile Game Nominee" GameOn Awards PH 2019
- "Best Sound & Music Award" GameOn Awards 2019
